message.body: Hows shadow doing? Is he listening to you?
Yeah he's been good. But he hasn't really eaten
Ok.. that's what Steph was wondering. He didn't really eat when I dog sat him when she was away forth of July

I wish we night more kibble and bits bec he loves those, maybe ge would have eaten then regardless lol. But I meant to tell you that the dog food in the Chinese container on the kitchen counter are treats for when he comes in from the yard. Rewarding him for that prevents him from being spiteful in the house
Yeah I give him treats for that.
He ate a little this morning
Ok cool.. we'll be home tonight. He's going to be super excited to see us lol
Yeah he will. He's been starving himself as a protest of your absence.
You arent still at our place are you?
